ScuRMST

Overview

ScuRMST package is used for for Sculpted RMST Two Stages Double-arm Clinical Trial Design.\ Sculpted refers to a defined critical region that necessitates both a significant difference in RMST between groups and a large absolute value of RMST in the experimental group in order to declare the treatment effective.\ Further information of technical details can be found at GitHub repository

Installation

You can install the development version of ScuRMST from GitHub with:

# Install devtools if you haven't already
install.packages("devtools")

# Install ScuRMST from GitHub
devtools::install_github("garcia-ho/ScuRMST")
